name: The Golden Scythe
description:
The Golden Scythe it's a single-screen game in which our protagonist enters a TV contest to be the successor of "The Reaper" since his previous Reaper died choking on a chicken bone.

THE GOLDEN SCYTHE only has three rules to win the contest:

1 - Get the 8 powerdown cards.
2 - Get 100,000 Gems (in a single session)
3 - Survive 500 seconds

Even though you die you will keep your gems, so as you get gems, you will get to unlock the 8 Powerdown cards.

PROBABLY THE HARDEST GAME YOU'VE PLAYED THIS WEEK.

---------------------------------

This game was designed, programmed and drawn in only 48 hours. Since its authors were unaware of the existence of the contest. Long live CRUNCH-TIME!

  • Game desing, Programming and Pixelart: @Narehop
  • Music and SFX: @BibikiGL
